Package CCDD

Class CcddInputFieldPanelHandler

java.lang.Object
CCDD.CcddInputFieldPanelHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
CcddTableEditorHandler, CcddTableTypeEditorHandler
public abstract class CcddInputFieldPanelHandler extends Object
CFS Command and Data Dictionary description and data field panel handler class. The editor panel contains the table description and data fields (if any)

    • enableDescriptionField

      protected void enableDescriptionField(boolean enable, String description)
      Enable/disable the description field, set its background color based on the enable status, and set the description text
      Parameters:
      enable - True to enable editing the description, false to disable
      description - Text to place in the description field

    • updateDescriptionField

      protected void updateDescriptionField(boolean undoable)
      Update the description field text. Put the edit on the undo/redo stack based on the input flag
      Parameters:
      undoable - True to enable putting the edit on the undo/redo stack

    • updateFieldComponentFromValue

      Update the data field component values to match the field information values

    • createDescAndDataFieldPanel

      protected void createDescAndDataFieldPanel(CcddMain ccddMain, Component fieldPnlHndlrOwner, JComponent upperPane, String ownerName, String description, List<CcddClassesDataTable.FieldInformation> ownerFieldInfo)
      Create the table input field panel
      Parameters:
      ccddMain - Main class reference
      fieldPnlHndlrOwner - Reference to the owner of this description and data field handler
      upperPane - Component to display above the description and data fields scroll pane; null if this field panel handler does not contain a table
      ownerName - Name of the owner of this field panel handler; null if no owner name is associated with it
      description - Description field text; null if the description is initially blank and disabled
      ownerFieldInfo - List of field information to use to build the data fields; null if no data field is associated with owner

    • createDataFieldPanel

      protected void createDataFieldPanel(boolean undoable, List<CcddClassesDataTable.FieldInformation> ownerFieldInfo, boolean ignoreApplicability)
      Create the data fields for display in the description and data field panel
      Parameters:
      undoable - True if the change(s) to the data fields should be stored for possible undo/redo operations; false to not store the changes
      ownerFieldInfo - List of field information to use to build the data fields null if no data field is associated with the owner
      ignoreApplicability - Should the applicability of the fields be ignored?

    • clearFieldValues

      protected void clearFieldValues()
      Clear the values from all fields

    • setFieldBackgound

      protected void setFieldBackgound()
      Set the data field background color for all fields based each field's value and required flag

    • setFieldBackground

      private void setFieldBackground(CcddClassesDataTable.FieldInformation fieldInfo)
      Set the specified data field's background color based the field's value and required flag
      Parameters:
      fieldInfo - Reference to the data field's information
